Part - III: (Defect Details)
a) Defect Category: Mission Critical
b) Defect Observed: Emergency lighting system failure. Abnormality observed during system test.
Part IV: Investigation: (Details of Examination including previous similar Defects)
a) Root Cause Analysis: Foreign object damage to critical surface
b) Findings / Conclusions: Detailed investigation conducted on the defective Battery Management component.
Functional testing confirmed the reported anomaly.
c) Remedial Measures Implement enhanced testing protocol before component installation
i. Corrective Action:
ii. Preventive Action: Implement condition-based monitoring system
d) Attributable Code: M - Other Reasons
Remarks: Investigation completed as per established procedures. All findings documented.
Part V: Remarks by Design
Design assessment confirms component operated within specified limits. Recommend enhanced inspection protocol.
Date: 14/09/2024 Authorized Signatory of Design: Eng. T.R. Menon
